detectors.description: DFS.pay() () uses a weak PRNG: "rest = (now - deposits[i].time) % 86400 ()"
detectors.markdown: [DFS.pay()]() uses a weak PRNG: "[rest = (now - deposits[i].time) % 86400]()"

detectors.description:
DFS.pay() () performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- depositDays = (now - deposits[i].time - rest) / 86400 ()
	- profit = deposits[i].amount * depositDays * 9 / 10 / 100 ()
detectors.markdown:
[DFS.pay()]() performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [depositDays = (now - deposits[i].time - rest) / 86400]()
	- [profit = deposits[i].amount * depositDays * 9 / 10 / 100]()

detectors.description: DFS.pay() () has external calls inside a loop: ! deposits[i].sender.send(amountToWithdraw) ()
detectors.markdown: [DFS.pay()]() has external calls inside a loop: [! deposits[i].sender.send(amountToWithdraw)]()

detectors.description:
DFS.pay() () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- deposits[i].plan == 1 ()
	- depositDays > 30 ()
	- deposits[i].plan == 2 ()
	- depositDays > 90 ()
	- deposits[i].plan == 3 ()
	- depositDays > 180 ()
	- profit > deposits[i].payed ()
	- this.balance > amountToWithdraw ()
detectors.markdown:
[DFS.pay()]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [deposits[i].plan == 1]()
	- [depositDays > 30]()
	- [deposits[i].plan == 2]()
	- [depositDays > 90]()
	- [deposits[i].plan == 3]()
	- [depositDays > 180]()
	- [profit > deposits[i].payed]()
	- [this.balance > amountToWithdraw]()

detectors.description:
DFS.pay() () has costly operations inside a loop:
	- i ++ ()
detectors.markdown:
[DFS.pay()]() has costly operations inside a loop:
	- [i ++]()

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected i < numDeposits && msg.gas > 200000 ():
	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [i < numDeposits && msg.gas > 200000]():
	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected THROW ():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [THROW]():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

detectors.description: Pragma version^0.4.4 () allows old versions
detectors.markdown: Pragma version[^0.4.4]() allows old versions

detectors.description: solc-0.4.4 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.4 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in DFS.makeDeposit(uint256,address,address,address) ():
	External calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(msg.value - 1000000000000000000000) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deposits[numDeposits ++] = Deposit(msg.sender,now,amount,plan,0) ()
	- deposits[numDeposits ++] = Deposit(msg.sender,now,amount,plan,0) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [DFS.makeDeposit(uint256,address,address,address)]():
	External calls:
	- [! msg.sender.send(msg.value - 1000000000000000000000)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [deposits[numDeposits ++] = Deposit(msg.sender,now,amount,plan,0)]()
	- [deposits[numDeposits ++] = Deposit(msg.sender,now,amount,plan,0)]()

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in DFS.pay() ():
	External calls:
	- ! deposits[i].sender.send(amountToWithdraw) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deposits[i].payed = profit ()
	- i ++ ()
	- i = 0 ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [DFS.pay()]():
	External calls:
	- [! deposits[i].sender.send(amountToWithdraw)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [deposits[i].payed = profit]()
	- [i ++]()
	- [i = 0]()
